amongst the squalor and desperation
there are traffickers here in Calais

smuggler armoured who we met on a rival
invites us into his private tent in the

wired to an agreed location this
smuggler specializes in getting migrants
onto trains for 1,200 pounds he claims
to offer the fastest route through the
channel tunnel to Folkston
our undercover researchers spent two
nights in the jungle
discovering an organized smuggling

operate in the time
they they have they're fearless because
they're not citizens or Nationals of
